login.title: Sign in to joyo
login.checkEmailMessage: We sent a magic link to
login.noPassword: No password needed. We'll email you a secure link.

emptyState.title: No gifts yet
emptyState.description: Start creating your first emotional gift experience

chat.title: Create Your Gift Experience
chat.subtitle: Describe your gift and AI will create a beautiful journey for your recipient.
chat.placeholder: Describe your gift experience... Who's it for and what's the occasion?

replaceDialog.title: Replace existing text?
replaceDialog.description: You already have text in the input. Do you want to replace it with this example?

romantic1.title: Anniversary Journey
romantic1.prompt: Create a romantic journey celebrating our 5-year anniversary. Include our favorite memories, a photo slideshow, and end with a surprise weekend getaway reveal.

romantic2.title: Proposal Story
romantic2.prompt: Build a story of how we met, with choices about our first date memories, leading to a big proposal reveal with a beautiful ring photo.

romantic3.title: Love Letter Journey
romantic3.prompt: Create an emotional journey with love letters I've written, questions about our future, ending with a promise ring reveal.

family1.title: Pregnancy Announcement
family1.prompt: Make a playful journey for announcing our pregnancy to grandparents. Include baby-themed questions and reveal with an ultrasound photo.

family2.title: New Home Reveal
family2.prompt: Create an exciting journey revealing our new home to family. Include photos of house hunting, neighborhood shots, and final house reveal.

family3.title: Grandparent Gift
family3.prompt: Build a warm journey from the grandkids with photos, voice messages, and a special reveal about our upcoming visit.

travel1.title: Surprise Trip
travel1.prompt: Create a mysterious journey with travel hints and clues, leading to the big reveal of a surprise trip to Japan.

travel2.title: Birthday Adventure
travel2.prompt: Build an adventure story for a birthday surprise. Include destination clues, packing list questions, and reveal a tropical island getaway.

travel3.title: Honeymoon Reveal
travel3.prompt: Create a romantic journey revealing our honeymoon destination. Include dream location questions and beautiful destination photos.

celebration1.title: Birthday Story
celebration1.prompt: Make a fun birthday journey with memories from the past year, favorite moments, and a special gift reveal at the end.

celebration2.title: Graduation Celebration
celebration2.prompt: Build a celebratory journey for graduation with achievements, future dreams questions, and a surprise gift reveal.

celebration3.title: Retirement Journey
celebration3.prompt: Create a heartfelt journey celebrating a retirement with career highlights, memories, and a special vacation reveal.

flowEditor.clickToPreview: Click a screen to preview it
flowEditor.noScreens: No screens yet. Add your first screen to get started.

nodeList.deleteDescription: This screen will be permanently removed from your gift. This action cannot be undone.

nodeEditor.title: Edit Screen
nodeEditor.description: Make changes to this screen. Changes will be saved to your draft.

dialog.publishDescription: Once published, you'll get a unique link to share with your recipient.
dialog.publishTip: Preview your gift before publishing to make sure everything looks perfect!
dialog.shareDescription: Your gift is live! Share this link with your recipient.
dialog.unpublishDescription: The share link will stop working and your recipient won't be able to access it anymore. You can always publish it again later.

features.shareLink: A unique shareable link is created
features.recipientAccess: Your recipient can view the experience
features.editLater: You can still edit and update the content
features.unpublishAnytime: You can unpublish at any time

toast.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

dialog.title: Choose a Theme
dialog.description: Select a theme that matches the emotional tone of your gift experience.

descriptions.playful-pastel: Light, fun, and cheerful with soft colors
descriptions.elegant-dark: Sophisticated and dramatic with dark tones
descriptions.warm-mediterranean: Warm and inviting with earthy colors

deleteConfirm.title: Delete this gift?
deleteConfirm.description: This will permanently delete your gift and all its screens. This action cannot be undone.

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be signed in to do that.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
